methods.name: Auctions
methods.description:
Returns all active auctions for a connected realm.

See the Connected Realm API for information about retrieving a list of connected realm IDs.

Auction house data updates at a set interval. The value was initially set at 1 hour; however, it might change over time without notice.

Depending on the number of active auctions on the specified connected realm, the response from this endpoint may be rather large, sometimes exceeding 10 MB.

parameters.name: {connectedRealmId}
parameters.description: The ID of the connected realm.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

methods.name: Commodities
methods.description:
Returns all active auctions for commodity items for the entire game region.

Auction house data updates at a set interval. The value was initially set at 1 hour; however, it might change over time without notice.

Depending on the number of active auctions on the specified connected realm, the response from this endpoint may be rather large, sometimes exceeding 10 MB.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

html:
The World of Warcraft game data APIs encompass both static and dynamic game data. For more information about static and dynamic game data, see World of Warcraft Namespaces.

Host Names

For all regions except China, the API host name follows the format {region}.api.blizzard.com, where {region} is one of us | eu | kr | tw. For China, the host name is gateway.battlenet.com.cn. For more information, see Regionality and APIs.

Namespaces

The World of Warcraft game data APIs

require a namespace as part of every request. Each endpoint below lists the correct namespace to use as a parameter. A namespace can be submitted as a header (Battlenet-Namespace: {namespace}) or as a query parameter (?namespace={namespace}). For more information, see World of Warcraft Namespaces.

Search

Certain data types in the World of Warcraft game data APIs support search. See Search for more information.

APIs

World of Warcraft supports the following game data APIs. For information about using the APIs, see Getting Started.
